h2_title: Helping Chen Loong Restore the Zodiac Village
content: Travel back to the Xu Dog in the Cellar below the Crouching Tiger Temple, and talk to him to receive the medicine that Chen Loong needs.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Xu_Dog_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Xu Dog Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Helping Chen Loong Restore the Zodiac Village'.
The content is as follows:
Travel back to the Xu Dog in the Cellar below the Crouching Tiger Temple, and talk to him to receive the medicine that Chen Loong needs.
